issue.title: [Website] Add more visible link to "Powered By" page to front page, simplify Powered By
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1978](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1978). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There can be a fine line between what is an open source project and what is a company and what is a product or organization, so to keep things simple I have consolidated things into a single list without passing any judgments. I have also added a link to the Powered By page that is visible without digging into any menus on the front page

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1978?focusedCommentId=16317006) by Julian Hyde (julianhyde):*
+1 removing the distinction between projects and companies

[The Powered By page](https://arrow.apache.org/powered_by/) suggests sending an email to dev but perhaps submitting a PR would be an easier process for all concerned.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1978?focusedCommentId=16321199) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
